ygData.subject: Re: Cash
ygData.msgSnippet: Heyas, As a dwarf I started with 200pp and got to 94. I made about 30 plat worth of mistakes, so I do not know how high I could have gotten. Your charisma
ygData.messageBody:
Heyas,
As a dwarf I started with 200pp and got to 94. I made about 30 plat worth of
mistakes, so I do not know how high I could have gotten. Your charisma directly
affects how much u need though because of supplies cost.

Nagol
